hf.game.items

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • hf.game.items.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DedicationToken, FavorToken, LakeTile, LanternCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Abstract card class contains common attributes and functions for cards
    Author:
    Sai
